name: Disquiet (plasticizer)
description:
Inspired by online accounts of schizophrenia/schizoaffective disorder. 

Disclaimer: This game might not be suitable for children or those who are easily disturbed.

Point-n-click to interact with stuff.

There are 2 "endings", either 'Lost' or 'Found'

Stressors will decrease SAN which may push Agnes to psychosis.
